_description: A love song — one stanza of eight short lines (perhaps incomplete)

BLAdd5465.First Lines: Loue fayne wolde Iyff I coude spye…
BLAdd5465.Note:
With music in two voices, of which only half of a single voice
                    survives.
BLAdd5465.Editions:
Stevens,  John,
                        ed.  
             Music and Poetry in the Early Tudor Court.
         London: Methuen, 1961: 355.
